title: Day 1003
content:
# Day 1003

One idea I had was to build an app where people submit a question and I give an answer via a nice note that only includes handwritten quotes.

So a person submits their problem and I only respond with 3 handwritten quotes to answer their question. The nice touch of a handwritten note could be cool. I would only accept Bitcoin. Something nice and lowkey. I like the idea.

I think by only accepting sats I can filter out the noise, find a unique audience who is interested in nice handwritten quotes and notes.

Boom I made the website here: [https://quotestoansweryourquestions.replit.app/](https://quotestoansweryourquestions.replit.app/)

I'm in hacker mode.

Just hacking things together. Doing stuff. Building in the arena (of my home and cyberspace)

What a freaking time to be alive.

Grateful, truly grateful.

12/19/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
